- Convert all component styles to Tailwind utility classes
- Keep complex animations and effects in @layer components
- Maintain all custom pseudo-elements and keyframe animations

Component Updates:
- Rewrite app/page.tsx with inline Tailwind utilities
- Preserve all functionality and responsive breakpoints
- Maintain hover effects, transitions, and animations
- Keep JavaScript state management classes (.visible, .active)

Benefits:
- Faster development with utility-first approach
- Smaller bundle size (Tailwind purges unused CSS)
- Better developer experience with autocomplete
- Easier to maintain and modify styles
- All styling visible in components (no CSS file switching)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Optimize page load times and add mobile-specific hero video

Performance Optimizations:
- Change video preload from "auto" to "metadata" for desktop videos
- Reduces initial page load by only loading video metadata
- Add lazy loading to all 6 atmosphere images
- Images load progressively as user scrolls

Mobile Video Implementation:
- Add dedicated portrait mobile video (Mobile video.webm)
- Show single full-screen video on mobile instead of split-screen
- Hide desktop videos on mobile, hide mobile video on desktop
- Add webkit-playsinline attribute for iOS compatibility
- Use preload="auto" for mobile video to ensure autoplay

Mobile Autoplay Fix:
- Ensure autoPlay works on all mobile devices
- Add webkit-playsinline="true" for older iOS devices
- Keep muted attribute (required for mobile autoplay)
- Video covers full viewport height on mobile

Benefits:
- Significantly faster initial page load
- Reduced bandwidth usage (only loads relevant video)
- Better mobile experience with portrait video
- Progressive image loading improves perceived performance
- Mobile video properly autoplays on iOS and Android

Bash(git commit -m "Fix parallax scroll: constrain images within section boundaries

Parallax Improvements:
- Calculate parallax relative to parent section, not viewport
- Clamp parallax offset to max 10% of section height
- Reduce parallax speed to 0.08 (from 0.15) for subtler effect
- Store original transform to prevent cumulative transforms
- Use section overflow:hidden to prevent images escaping

Section Constraints:
- Add overflow:hidden to all sections except hero
- Prevents atmosphere images from bleeding into adjacent sections
- Creates cleaner section transitions

Benefits:
- No more messy image overlap between sections
- Parallax effect stays contained and subtle
- Smoother, more professional scroll experience

Bash(git commit -m "Improve mobile video autoplay with aggressive iOS compatibility

Mobile Video Improvements:
- Add iOS device detection (iPad, iPhone, iPod)
- Force volume to 0 and defaultMuted for iOS
- Add x-webkit-airplay attribute for older iOS devices
- Remove defaultMuted attribute from HTML (conflicts with JS)
- Simplify video element (remove inline styles, use bg-black on parent)

Autoplay Strategy:
- Multiple rapid-fire play attempts (0ms, 100ms, 300ms, 600ms, 1000ms)
- Add comprehensive interaction listeners:
  - touchstart, touchmove, touchend
  - click, scroll (both document and window)
- Listeners auto-remove after first successful play
- Console logging for debugging

Fallback for Blocked Autoplay:
- Video will play on ANY user interaction
- Covers all possible touch/scroll/click events
- Ensures video plays even if autoplay is blocked

Note: 20MB webm file may still cause issues on slow connections.
Consider compressing video to <10MB for better mobile performance.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")
